timeline.message:
Enhance null header value exception

Motivation:
For HTTP null header values are not allowed. An exception is thrown but
doesn't include the key which makes it more difficult for users to
understand the root cause.

Modifications:
- Enrich the null value exception to include the key

Result:
More informative exceptions.

timeline.bodyText: I think at one point this class may have been used in multiple places, however this is no longer the case so I consolidated the key into the base class.
timeline.author: Scottmitch
